'''Nen Lalaith''' was a babbling stream that rose under the mountain of [[Amon Darthir]] in the [[Ered Wethrin|Mountains of Shadow]], and flowed north-westwards out onto the shaded plains of [[Dor-lómin]].<ref>{{CH|4}}</ref> There, it trickled past the house of [[Húrin]], and was said to have given its name to his ill-fated young daughter, [[Lalaith]].<ref>{{CH|1}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Nen Lalaith'' means "Water of Laughter" in [[Sindarin]], from ''[[nen]]'' ("river, water") and ''[[Lalaith (word)|lalaith]]'' ("laughter").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-3474801053.html|articlename=S. ''Nen Lalaith'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=27 December 2020}}</ref>
